item.title: Whoami
item.description: Oscar Self taught Computer Science Professional, with experience managing Google Cloud applications. In the last year of my career, I’ve discovered the things Iâ€™m more aligned to do. AUTOMATE everything! Writing Infrastructure as code, CI/CD pipelines or scripts. Alongside this, playing and discovering more and more about Linux has been a wonderful experience. I’ve enjoyed it so much, that I’ve ended up replacing windows, and it has become my main Operating System!
